Listen to Harry Potter and the Sacred Text!

--- First Post ---

04 Sep 2019

So my mission is as follows:

  1. An active link
  2. Image
  3. Two Videos (one through You Tube search and one by embedding HTML)
  4. Google Translate gadget
  5. Box embed
  6. RSS feeds
  7. A post

Well, this is a post, so HOORAY!

The translate widget, the Box embed, and an RSS feed for the four most recent episodes of Harry Potter and the Sacred Text are on every page. If you’ve never listened to HPST before, I recommend starting from the beginning.

Here’s a picture of Shaq with a mouse lemur named Fuggles.

Because I’m not blogging through Google, I can’t include videos in any way other than just coding it in, so I’ll give you only one video. But it is such a masterpiece that it is easily worth two, even three videos. Four videos.
